short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View your grades without the hassel of Navagating PSU's Angel System.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fed up with how tiny Angel's report system output is? So am I! That's what I created Quick Grade! View your grades in a matter of seconds without the hassel of navigating PSU's Angel System!

v1.3.2 Update
* Beautified extension 
* Included a feedback module.
* The main popup runs under Chrome's sandbox feature due to Quick Grade's usage of inline Javascript.
